img_above_text:
![Wukong PurpleCloud 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_PurpleCloud_6.jpg)
Try taking this foe out first, and you'll find a winding path leading up to the peak, across a fallen tree trunk to a high peak, where you'll find a wooden **Treasure Chest** next to the fallen log that holds the **Gold Sun Crow Curio** (bolstering its effect when paired with the Jade Moon Rabbit!).
img_below_text:
From here you can head down across the top of the archway gate where a green Wisp floats, allowing you to come back down to ambush the other archer and then take out the strong snake to gain the Snake Herbalist Spirit.
Going directly through the archway leads to yet another gate and the Shrine to the next main area, so first head right under the large tree trunk platform above.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong PurpleCloud 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_PurpleCloud_6.jpg)
Try taking this foe out first, and you'll find a winding path leading up to the peak, across a fallen tree trunk to a high peak, where you'll find a wooden **Treasure Chest** next to the fallen log that holds the **Gold Sun Crow Curio** (bolstering its effect when paired with the Jade Moon Rabbit!)."
        - Following Text: "From here you can head down across the top of the archway gate where a green Wisp floats, allowing you to come back down to ambush the other archer and then take out the strong snake to gain the Snake Herbalist Spirit.
Going directly through the archway leads to yet another gate and the Shrine to the next main area, so first head right under the large tree trunk platform above."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the player character, wielding a weapon resembling a staff, faces off against a lizard-like enemy armed with a spear. The setting is an outdoor area with rocky terrain and autumnal foliage. This scene aligns with the preceding text, which advises taking down this foe to access a path leading to a treasure chest containing the **Gold Sun Crow Curio**, and the following text, which describes subsequent navigation options after defeating enemies in the area.
